userData:
#!/bin/bash
# udf0 begin
exec 1>/var/ec2/userdata.log
exec 2>&1
set -x

PATH=/bin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin

app="akms"
appenv="test"
region="us-east-1"
appuser="${app}${appenv}"
stack=""
cluster="akms"
autogrp="akms-v002"
launchconfig="akms-v002-20111011091431"
clusterorapp=${cluster:-$app}
nflxbase=`rpm -q nflx-base | sed 's:nflx-base-1..-\(.*\)$:\1:'`
appdynappname="$region $appenv"

newbase() {
    test $nflxbase > 552092
}

setenv_sh="/apps/tomcat/bin/setenv.sh"
NFenv="/apps/tomcat/bin/netflix.env"
server_template_xml="/apps/tomcat/conf/server_template.xml"
server_xml="/apps/tomcat/conf/server.xml"
instanceid=`/usr/bin/instance-id`


# udf0 end
# udf-test begin
[[ $region == us-east-1 ]] && appdynappname="Cloud Milestones - test AWS"
 


# udf-test end
# udf1 begin
hostnamestring=${clusterorapp}-${instanceid}
hostname $hostnamestring
printf "/^HOSTNAME/ d\n $\na\nHOSTNAME=${hostnamestring}\n.\nw\nq\n" | ed -s /etc/sysconfig/network
echo "127.0.0.1 localhost" > /etc/hosts
printf "%s\t%s %s.netflix.com %s\n" `local-ipv4` `hostname` `hostname` `public-hostname` >> /etc/hosts
test -n "$reg_hosts" && echo $reg_hosts >> /etc/hosts

eval `gawk -F: '/60004/ {print "amirole=" $1}' /etc/passwd`
test -n "$amirole" && userdel -f $amirole
groupadd -f -g 60243 nac
useradd -u 60004 -g nac -c "$app $appenv role" $appuser
if ! newbase; then
mkdir -p /home/${appuser}/.ssh

 


 


test -f $cf4 && perl -pne '{ s/^(.*= cloud).*$/$1,%OS_USER2%/; }' -i $cf4 && cfud $cf4



curl="curl --retry 3 --silent --show-error --fail"
metadatavars() {
local url=$1
for uri in `$curl $url`
do
echo $uri | grep -q -E '=' && continue
echo $uri | grep -q -E 'public' && continue
if echo $uri | grep -q -E '/$'
then
metadatavars "${url}${uri}"
else
printf "export EC2_%s=\"%s\"\n"  `echo $uri | tr '/-' '_' | tr 'a-z' 'A-Z'` "`$curl ${url}${uri}| tr '\n' ' '`"
fi
done
}



metadatavars http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/ >> /etc/profile.d/netflix_environment.sh
. /etc/profile.d/netflix_environment.sh

 
ln -s $jmxf $jmxl

if newbase
then
/usr/local/bin/installcrontab $appuser
else

fi


 

if ! grep -q '/etc/alternatives/java_sdk/lib/tools.jar' /apps/tomcat/bin/setclasspath.sh
then

fi

 
# udf1 end

# added for CRL support (will be activated only for builds >= 1470)

server_template_crl=/apps/tomcat/conf/server_template_2011.xml 

 

# end added for CRL support
 
touch /tmp/udf-complete
# udf2 end

#!/bin/bash
# udf0 begin
exec 1>/var/ec2/userdata.log
exec 2>&1
set -x

PATH=/bin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin

app="akms"
appenv="test"
region="us-east-1"
appuser="${app}${appenv}"
stack=""
cluster="akms"
autogrp="akms-v002"
launchconfig="akms-v002-20111011092456"
clusterorapp=${cluster:-$app}
nflxbase=`rpm -q nflx-base | sed 's:nflx-base-1..-\(.*\)$:\1:'`
appdynappname="$region $appenv"

newbase() {
    test $nflxbase > 552092
}

setenv_sh="/apps/tomcat/bin/setenv.sh"
NFenv="/apps/tomcat/bin/netflix.env"
server_template_xml="/apps/tomcat/conf/server_template.xml"
server_xml="/apps/tomcat/conf/server.xml"
instanceid=`/usr/bin/instance-id`


# udf0 end
# udf-test begin
[[ $region == us-east-1 ]] && appdynappname="Cloud Milestones - test AWS"
 


# udf-test end
# udf1 begin
hostnamestring=${clusterorapp}-${instanceid}
hostname $hostnamestring
printf "/^HOSTNAME/ d\n $\na\nHOSTNAME=${hostnamestring}\n.\nw\nq\n" | ed -s /etc/sysconfig/network
echo "127.0.0.1 localhost" > /etc/hosts
printf "%s\t%s %s.netflix.com %s\n" `local-ipv4` `hostname` `hostname` `public-hostname` >> /etc/hosts
test -n "$reg_hosts" && echo $reg_hosts >> /etc/hosts

eval `gawk -F: '/60004/ {print "amirole=" $1}' /etc/passwd`
test -n "$amirole" && userdel -f $amirole
groupadd -f -g 60243 nac
useradd -u 60004 -g nac -c "$app $appenv role" $appuser
if ! newbase; then
mkdir -p /home/${appuser}/.ssh

 


 


test -f $cf4 && perl -pne '{ s/^(.*= cloud).*$/$1,%OS_USER2%/; }' -i $cf4 && cfud $cf4



curl="curl --retry 3 --silent --show-error --fail"
metadatavars() {
local url=$1
for uri in `$curl $url`
do
echo $uri | grep -q -E '=' && continue
echo $uri | grep -q -E 'public' && continue
if echo $uri | grep -q -E '/$'
then
metadatavars "${url}${uri}"
else
printf "export EC2_%s=\"%s\"\n"  `echo $uri | tr '/-' '_' | tr 'a-z' 'A-Z'` "`$curl ${url}${uri}| tr '\n' ' '`"
fi
done
}



metadatavars http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/ >> /etc/profile.d/netflix_environment.sh
. /etc/profile.d/netflix_environment.sh

 
ln -s $jmxf $jmxl

if newbase
then
/usr/local/bin/installcrontab $appuser
else

fi


 

if ! grep -q '/etc/alternatives/java_sdk/lib/tools.jar' /apps/tomcat/bin/setclasspath.sh
then

fi

 
# udf1 end




# added for CRL support (will be activated only for builds >= 1470)

server_template_crl=/apps/tomcat/conf/server_template_2011.xml 

 

# end added for CRL support
 
touch /tmp/udf-complete
# udf2 end

. /etc/profile.d/netflix_environment.sh

 
ln -s $jmxf $jmxl

if newbase
then
/usr/local/bin/installcrontab $appuser

fi


 

if ! grep -q '/etc/alternatives/java_sdk/lib/tools.jar' /apps/tomcat/bin/setclasspath.sh
then

fi

 
# udf1 end




# added for CRL support (will be activated only for builds >= 1470)

if echo $uri | grep -q -E '/$'
then
metadatavars "${url}${uri}"
else
printf "export EC2_%s=\"%s\"\n"  `echo $uri | tr '/-' '_' | tr 'a-z' 'A-Z'` "`$curl ${url}${uri}| tr '\n' ' '`"
fi
done
}



metadatavars http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/ >> /etc/profile.d/netflix_environment.sh
. /etc/profile.d/netflix_environment.sh

 
ln -s $jmxf $jmxl

if newbase
then
/usr/local/bin/installcrontab $appuser
else

fi


 

if ! grep -q '/etc/alternatives/java_sdk/lib/tools.jar' /apps/tomcat/bin/setclasspath.sh
then

fi

 
# udf1 end




# added for CRL support (will be activated only for builds >= 1470)

server_template_crl=/apps/tomcat/conf/server_template_2011.xml 

 

# end added for CRL support
 
touch /tmp/udf-complete
# udf2 end

#!/bin/bash
# udf0 begin
exec 1>/var/ec2/userdata.log
exec 2>&1
set -x

PATH=/bin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin

app="akms"
appenv="test"
region="us-east-1"
appuser="${app}${appenv}"
stack=""
cluster="akms"
autogrp="akms-v002"
launchconfig="akms-v002-20111018141009"
clusterorapp=${cluster:-$app}
nflxbase=`rpm -q nflx-base | sed 's:nflx-base-1..-\(.*\)$:\1:'`
appdynappname="$region $appenv"

newbase() {
    test $nflxbase > 552092
}

setenv_sh="/apps/tomcat/bin/setenv.sh"
NFenv="/apps/tomcat/bin/netflix.env"
server_template_xml="/apps/tomcat/conf/server_template.xml"
server_xml="/apps/tomcat/conf/server.xml"
instanceid=`/usr/bin/instance-id`


# udf0 end
# udf-test begin
[[ $region == us-east-1 ]] && appdynappname="Cloud Milestones - test AWS"
 


# udf-test end
# udf1 begin
hostnamestring=${clusterorapp}-${instanceid}
hostname $hostnamestring
printf "/^HOSTNAME/ d\n $\na\nHOSTNAME=${hostnamestring}\n.\nw\nq\n" | ed -s /etc/sysconfig/network
echo "127.0.0.1 localhost" > /etc/hosts
printf "%s\t%s %s.netflix.com %s\n" `local-ipv4` `hostname` `hostname` `public-hostname` >> /etc/hosts
test -n "$reg_hosts" && echo $reg_hosts >> /etc/hosts

eval `gawk -F: '/60004/ {print "amirole=" $1}' /etc/passwd`
test -n "$amirole" && userdel -f $amirole
groupadd -f -g 60243 nac
useradd -u 60004 -g nac -c "$app $appenv role" $appuser
if ! newbase; then
mkdir -p /home/${appuser}/.ssh

 


 


test -f $cf4 && perl -pne '{ s/^(.*= cloud).*$/$1,%OS_USER2%/; }' -i $cf4 && cfud $cf4



curl="curl --retry 3 --silent --show-error --fail"
metadatavars() {
local url=$1
for uri in `$curl $url`
do
echo $uri | grep -q -E '=' && continue
echo $uri | grep -q -E 'public' && continue
if echo $uri | grep -q -E '/$'
then
metadatavars "${url}${uri}"
else
printf "export EC2_%s=\"%s\"\n"  `echo $uri | tr '/-' '_' | tr 'a-z' 'A-Z'` "`$curl ${url}${uri}| tr '\n' ' '`"
fi
done
}



metadatavars http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/ >> /etc/profile.d/netflix_environment.sh
. /etc/profile.d/netflix_environment.sh

 
ln -s $jmxf $jmxl

if newbase
then
/usr/local/bin/installcrontab $appuser
else

fi


 

if ! grep -q '/etc/alternatives/java_sdk/lib/tools.jar' /apps/tomcat/bin/setclasspath.sh
then

fi

 
# udf1 end




# added for CRL support (will be activated only for builds >= 1470)

server_template_crl=/apps/tomcat/conf/server_template_2011.xml 

 

# end added for CRL support
 
touch /tmp/udf-complete
# udf2 end

# udf0 end
# udf-test begin
[[ $region == us-east-1 ]] && appdynappname="Cloud Milestones - test AWS"
 


# udf-test end
# udf1 begin
hostnamestring=${clusterorapp}-${instanceid}
hostname $hostnamestring
printf "/^HOSTNAME/ d\n $\na\nHOSTNAME=${hostnamestring}\n.\nw\nq\n" | ed -s /etc/sysconfig/network
echo "127.0.0.1 localhost" > /etc/hosts
printf "%s\t%s %s.netflix.com %s\n" `local-ipv4` `hostname` `hostname` `public-hostname` >> /etc/hosts
test -n "$reg_hosts" && echo $reg_hosts >> /etc/hosts

eval `gawk -F: '/60004/ {print "amirole=" $1}' /etc/passwd`
test -n "$amirole" && userdel -f $amirole
groupadd -f -g 60243 nac
useradd -u 60004 -g nac -c "$app $appenv role" $appuser
if ! newbase; then
mkdir -p /home/${appuser}/.ssh

 


 


test -f $cf4 && perl -pne '{ s/^(.*= cloud).*$/$1,%OS_USER2%/; }' -i $cf4 && cfud $cf4



curl="curl --retry 3 --silent --show-error --fail"
metadatavars() {
local url=$1
for uri in `$curl $url`
do
echo $uri | grep -q -E '=' && continue
echo $uri | grep -q -E 'public' && continue
if echo $uri | grep -q -E '/$'
then
metadatavars "${url}${uri}"
else
printf "export EC2_%s=\"%s\"\n"  `echo $uri | tr '/-' '_' | tr 'a-z' 'A-Z'` "`$curl ${url}${uri}| tr '\n' ' '`"
fi
done
}



metadatavars http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/ >> /etc/profile.d/netflix_environment.sh
. /etc/profile.d/netflix_environment.sh

 
ln -s $jmxf $jmxl

if newbase
then
/usr/local/bin/installcrontab $appuser
else

fi


 

if ! grep -q '/etc/alternatives/java_sdk/lib/tools.jar' /apps/tomcat/bin/setclasspath.sh
then

fi

 
# udf1 end
# helloworld-example-test
# nactest push adds this text to user data in all ASGs that are part of the helloworld-example cluster,
#   including ASGs helloworld-example and helloworld-example-v001 and helloworld-example-v002
# Combined custom UDFs for an instance must stay below 9000 characters.

# Environment variable can be read in Java code on the instance like this:
# String flavor = System.getenv("FAVORITE_GELATO_FLAVOR")
cat <<EndOfInput>> /etc/profile.d/netflix_environment.sh
export FAVORITE_GELATO_FLAVOR="Coconut Pistachio"
export FAVORITE_MUSICAL_INSTRUMENT="Acoustic Guitar"
EndOfInput

# helloworld-test for us-east-1
# nactest push adds this text to user data for all helloworld instances in us-east-1.
# Combined custom UDFs for an instance must stay below 9000 characters.

# Use Java to read environment variables set here.
# String pizzaToppings = System.getenv("FAVORITE_PIZZA_TOPPINGS")
cat <<EndOfInput>> /etc/profile.d/netflix_environment.sh
export FAVORITE_PIZZA_TOPPINGS="Artichokes and Olives"
export FAVORITE_BEVERAGE="Sherry"
EndOfInput

# helloworld-example-test for us-east-1
# nactest push adds this text to user data in all ASGs that are part of the helloworld-example cluster in us-east-1,
#   including ASGs helloworld-example and helloworld-example-v001 and helloworld-example-v002
# Combined custom UDFs for an instance must stay below 9000 characters.

# Environment variable can be read in Java code on the instance like this:
# String flavor = System.getenv("FAVORITE_GELATO_FLAVOR")
cat <<EndOfInput>> /etc/profile.d/netflix_environment.sh
export FAVORITE_GELATO_FLAVOR="Campfire Banana"
export FAVORITE_MUSICAL_INSTRUMENT="Irish Flute"
EndOfInput

# udf2 begin
chown -R ${appuser}:nac /apps
touch /tmp/udf-complete
# udf2 end
